titleStmt.title: A letter to Dr. Tancred Robinson, in answer to some passages in his to Mr. VVotton, relating to Mr. Harris's remarks on some late papers, &c.
titleStmt.author: Harris, John, 1667?-1719.

notesStmt.note: In reply to a letter, by Dr. Tancred Robinson, to Mr. William Wotton, B.D. Chaplain to ... the Earl of Nottingham ... some late remarks, &c. Written by John Harris, A.M.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
